attributes.action: Say NO to second referendum on EU Membership.
attributes.additional_details: We were finally given a voice where our 1 vote counted as never before, to this end, as in a General Election, we should be working together to make this count. The people in this country were brave enough to stand up to all the scaremongering data put forward to us and therefore the vote should stay as counted.
attributes.background: Over half the UK population used their vote to choose to leave the EU, now there is a petition from within the Remain group to implement a Second Referendum. This is not democracy, the choice has been made, if it had gone the other way there would not be any of this.
